Piercing Fragments: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.
Shock Effect: When Jade Screen is shattered, its CD will reset. Can occur once every 6s.
Majesty be the Array of Stars: Increases the Level of Starshatter by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Be: Jade Screen increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.
Invincible be the Jade Screen: Increases the Level of Jade Screen by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Grandeur be the Seven Stars: When Starshatter is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.
